duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee 3 to 5 Foreman/Crews and ensures company policies and procedures are followed during work plan execution.
Forecast company’s needs for labor, equipment, tools, and material on a continuous basis.
Recommend and implement improvements to company policies, procedures, operations and production.
Ensure completion of all inspections, JHA’s, Job Briefings, Safety Meetings and all other reports.
Meet with property owners as needed for access and/or conflict resolution.
Responsible for planning, construction, installation, and/or operation of natural gas systems; coordinates construction activities with other areas.
Administer safety programs and ensure safety standards are met while executing work plans.
Ensures continuous productivity improvements through increased quality field time with crews.
Ensure crew productivity levels are safely and efficiently met, maintained, or exceeded.
Monitor crew hours and approve overtime hours.
